jobs.title: Sales Development Manager (Inside Sales)
jobs.description:
THE COMPANY:

Fidel’s mission is to democratise access to financial data globally, so that consumers are in control of their data. We’re working to build a world where power and control of consumer financial data shifts back to the consumer. Our technology makes transactional data accessible through a single access point for global businesses like Avios, Klarna and the Royal Bank of Canada. We have a record of fast growth and our key investors include Horizon Ventures and Innovate UK.

THE ROLE:

Group: Marketing | Function: Sales Lead Generation
Fidel offers the chance to join a fast-moving and growing team. As the first team member of the Sales Lead Generation team, you’ll build Fidel’s lead generation strategy from scratch. You’ll build out a global team of ambitious Sales Lead Generation Representatives who are focused on prospecting and qualifying leads. You and your team will promote our product through B2B outbound phone calls, emails and events across a range of suitable industries and companies. 

ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES:

Prospecting: Identifying key markets to target and qualifying against our solution to determine fit

Cold outreach: Performing a number of daily outbound calls to generate client bookings, effectively pitching Fidel’s solution and value proposition

Email Lead Generation: Creating a list of prospects and targeting via high volume outbound campaigns as well as individual targeted emails

CRM Maintenance: Data collection, maintenance of sales records and 
recording information on opportunities and prospects on Salesforce
Target Achievement: Achieve team and individual sales targets set by the Marketing team.

Process Driven: Lead the setup & improvement of the Sales Lead Generation function for Fidel globally and bring about scalable processes & technical improvements.

Leadership: Lead Sales Lead Generation objective setting, motivate the team, plan team capacity and client assignment and hire new team members.
Reporting: Measure all aspects of role and regularly provide status updates to leadership and company.

SKILLS:

We generally don’t have hard and fast requirements - everyone is different. We are looking for you to demonstrate whether you have the core attributes. Skills we’re hoping to see highlighted in your CV and application:

Lead Generation: Proven track record of outbound lead generation with strong qualification skills and data gathering resulting in sales success in a B2B & SaaS context. Experience working with sales tools including Salesforce and Salesloft or similar.

Communication: Well-organised, self-motivated doer with exceptional verbal and written, and presentation skills. You’ll be happy chatting with C-level Executives and confident in outlining Fidel’s value proposition. Most importantly, you will be engaging on the phone and be the kind of person that our prospects love talking to! 

Management: Hire, manage and develop team members at entry levels. You’re excited by the prospect of building and coaching a world class team and maximising their effectiveness. 

Technological aptitude: Experience working with APIs, preferably in the payments industry. Technical curiosity and aptitude to learn and consult with prospects about technical aspects of the product.

Analytical: Analytical and process-oriented mindset (identify trends, problems and suggest solutions). 

Growth mindset: Enthusiastic for continuous learning and improvement. Tenacious and undaunted by new responsibilities, thinking quickly on your feet and contributing to all stages of the sales funnel.

INTERVIEW PROCESS (2 weeks):

Simple profile matching from us - assessing your application against the role
A two-way conversation where we both can find out a bit more about each other
Interview with Team Lead 
Share previous work examples
Final Interview with CEO & CTO
Feedback from interviews/job offer

OUR VALUES:

To be a great fit at Fidel, we look for individuals who share our values. We have over 15 nationalities in our growing team and speak 14 languages, making this an exciting and culturally enriching place to work. Check out the team and life at Fidel!

BENEFITS:

We're committed to making Fidel a fantastic place to work and we go to great lengths to give you what you need to succeed. You’ll receive:
Share options - you are part of the Fidel’s success. So why not share the rewards!
Unlimited leave 
Flexible working - work from home or abroad when you need to
Vitality health insurance
Perkbox benefits scheme
A fully stocked kitchen with unlimited snacks & refreshments
Friday team lunch & drinks
Pension with Smart Pension (employer contribution 2% of base salary)
Dinner if you need to work late
Unlimited budget for any software or books you need

At Fidel, we don’t just accept difference - we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status or disability status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.

If you think you’d be a great fit, apply today!
